metadata.title: WAN Federation Through Mesh Gateways - Multiple Kubernetes Clusters
metadata.description: WAN federation through mesh gateways enables federating multiple Kubernetes clusters in Consul. Learn how to configure primary and secondary datacenters, export a federation secret, get the k8s API URL, and verify federation.

outlineItems.title: WAN Federation Between Multiple Kubernetes Clusters Through Mesh Gateways

pageHeading.title: WAN Federation Between Multiple Kubernetes Clusters Through Mesh Gateways

context is `,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},`dc1`),` and we're querying for the list of services in `,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},`dc2`),`:`),mdx("pre",{"className":"language-shell-session"},mdx("code",{parentName:"pre","className":"language-shell-session"},mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token command"},mdx("span",{parentName:"span","className":"token shell-symbol important"},`$`),` `,mdx("span",{parentName:"span","className":"token bash language-bash"},`kubectl `,mdx("span",{parentName:"span","className":"token builtin class-name"},`exec`),` statefulset/consul-server --namespace consul -- consul catalog services -datacenter dc2`)),`

route between services deployed on each cluster.`),mdx("p",null,`You can also read our in-depth documentation on `,mdx("a",{parentName:"p","href":"/consul/docs/k8s/connect"},`Consul Service Mesh In Kubernetes`),`.`),mdx("p",null,`If you are still considering a move to Kubernetes, or to Consul on Kubernetes specifically, our `,mdx("a",{parentName:"p","href":"/consul/tutorials/microservices?utm_source=docs"},`Migrate to Microservices with Consul Service Mesh on Kubernetes`),`
collection uses an example application written by a fictional company to illustrate why and how organizations can
migrate from monolith to microservices using Consul service mesh on Kubernetes. The case study in this collection
should provide information valuable for understanding how to develop services that leverage Consul during any stage
of your microservices journey.`))};MDXContent.isMDXComponent=true;

metadata.title: Consul by HashiCorp
metadata.description: Consul is a service networking solution to automate network configurations, discover services, and enable secure connectivity across any cloud or runtime.
